nodes.text: A nest referred to a group of Gands that hailed from the same Gand colony. Whether or not these Gands were related was unclear.
A nest of Gands relocated to Nar Shaddaa in 3951 BBY in order to collect the bounty on a Jedi set by the local Exchange crime lord G0-T0.

Gand Nest was introduced in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, a roleplaying video game released by Obsidian Entertainment in late 2004. The nest is mentioned by Vossk to the Jedi Exile as description of group of Gands that are hunting her.
